name: Snowball Street
description:
Hi, this is my first ever game I made by using Unity Engine.  It was a fun little project to do. All the assets are made by me. Please let me know what you think and leave a comment. Thanks!

Controls:

W,S  or Up, Down keys to move.

Left mouse-click or Ctrl key to shoot.

Known bugs: 144hz monitors might suffer from framerate issues.
